metadata.description: The MCU Guidebooks launch into Phase 2 of the Cinematic Universe!  Featuring fact sheets, movie-to-comic comparisons and production stills, this issue is packed with profiles and updates on heroes including Iron Man and Iron Patriot; stalwart allies including Pepper Potts, Happy Hogan; and deadly foes including the Mandarin, Aldrich Killian, and A.I.M.! Plus: Extremis!  President Ellis! And more! Relive the big-screen thrills of Marvel's Iron Man 3 right here!
metadata.name: Guidebook to the Marvel Cinematic Universe - Marvel's Iron Man 3
